arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leverkusen back on track, Stuttgart earn first win, Leipzig fail against Union
arts.sum: A highly intriguing set of results in the latest set of Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs concluded with German European representatives Bayer 04 Leverkusen, VfB Stuttgart, and Eintracht Frankfurt taking all three points from respective opponents Hoffenheim, Gladbach, and Wolfsburg. SC Freiburg were also able to prevail at home over VfL Bochum. In the only match to end in a draw, RB Leipzig and 1. FC Union Berlin played to a 0-0 scoreless stalemate at the Red Bull Arena.

arts.ttl: Transfer Talk: Man City eye Xavi Simons to replace Kevin De Bruyne
arts.sum: Man City join Liverpool and Bayern Munich in the race to sign Leipzig's Xavi Simons. Transfer Talk has the latest.

arts.ttl: Arsenal & Man Utd snubbed: RB Leipzig chief reveals reason behind Xavi Simons return
arts.sum: Xavi Simons returned to RB Leipzig on loan this summer due to his desire to be a “key player,” according to Marcel Schafer, the club’s Managing Director for Sport. “It was an amazing signal for everyone at the club that we achieved the next level because we kept Xavi Simons, who like Dani Olmo was one of the best players at the Euros,” Schafer told FootballTransfers.

arts.ttl: Arsenal target Benjamin Sesko 'is the complete striker' says RB Leipzig chief
arts.sum: RB Leipzig star Benjamin Sesko is the “complete striker,” according to the club’s Managing Director for Sport Marcel Schafer. Arsenal target Benjamin Sesko 'is the complete striker' says RB Leipzig chief

arts.ttl: Rejected Arsenal - Why Benjamin Sesko opted to stay at RB Leipzig
arts.sum: The interest was sky-high. Arsenal, in particular, pushed hard to sign RB Leipzig forward Benjamin Sesko this summer. But rather than leaving the Bundesliga for London, Sesko...

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs. Union Berlin preview: Hosts looking to maintain perfect start
arts.sum: RB Leipzig will attempt to maintain their perfect start to the 2024/25 season when they welcome Union Berlin to the Red Bull Arena on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Leipzig chief: Simons will push team to next level
arts.sum: RB Leipzig's managing director for sport Marcel Schäfer said securing Xavi Simons on loan for another season will help push the club to the next level.

arts.ttl: Xavi Simons transfer boost as Manchester United 'target' makes transfer decision
arts.sum: Latest Manchester United transfer news and gossip with updates on RB Leipzig star Xavi Simons and former Juventus midfielder Adrien Rabiot

arts.ttl: Preview: RB Leipzig vs. Union Berlin - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and Union Berlin, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: After failed Brentford deal - Why Antonio Nusa opted to join RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Antonio Nusa has had an instant impact on his new club, RB Leipzig. Signed for €21m from Brugge in the summer, the 19-year-old Norwegian winger scored in the DFB Pokal first round...
